• {{items}} --Total Quantity : {{0}}
import { Component , Input} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-item', templateUrl: './product-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-item.component.scss'] }) export class ProductItemComponent { // use of parent to child product-item=>child && list-component parent @Input() name:any = []; @Input() quantity = 0; type(value:any){ this.name.push(value); } set counter(value:any){ this.quantity = value; } get(){ return this.quantity; } add(){ this.quantity++; } minus(){ this.quantity--; } }
